innerText: (15) 5. Maṅgalavaggo
1. Akusalasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi

, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi? Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
innerText: 147. ‘‘Tīhi , bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi? Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

children: ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. Katamehi tīhi? Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena – imehi kho
, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. Katamehi tīhi? Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena – imehi kho , bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.
2. Sāvajjasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi? Sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
innerText: 148. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. Katamehi tīhi? Sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.

‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge. Katamehi tīhi? Anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ sagge’’ti. Dutiyaṃ.
3. Visamasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi
, bhikkhave…pe… visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ niraye.
innerText: 149. ‘‘Tīhi , bhikkhave…pe… visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ niraye.

children: ‘‘Tīhi
, bhikkhave, dhammehi…pe… samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ sagge’’ti. Tatiyaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Tīhi , bhikkhave, dhammehi…pe… samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ sagge’’ti. Tatiyaṃ.
4. Asucisuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ niraye.
innerText: 150. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena – imehi kho…pe… evaṃ niraye.
‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge’’ti. Catutthaṃ.
5. Paṭhamakhatasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi tīhi? Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.
innerText: 151. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi tīhi? Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṃ upahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavati.

children: ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato

paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi tīhi? Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena…pe…. Pañcamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavati. Katamehi tīhi? Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena…pe…. Pañcamaṃ.
6. Dutiyakhatasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena…pe….
innerText: 152. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena…pe….

children: ‘‘Tīhi
, bhikkhave…pe… anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena…pe…. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Tīhi , bhikkhave…pe… anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena…pe…. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
7. Tatiyakhatasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena…pe….
innerText: 153. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… visamena kāyakammena, visamena vacīkammena, visamena manokammena…pe….

children: ‘‘Tīhi
, bhikkhave…pe… samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena…pe…. Sattamaṃ.
innerText: ‘‘Tīhi , bhikkhave…pe… samena kāyakammena, samena vacīkammena, samena manokammena…pe…. Sattamaṃ.
8. Catutthakhatasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena…pe….
innerText: 154. ‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… asucinā kāyakammena, asucinā vacīkammena, asucinā manokammena…pe….

‘‘Tīhi, bhikkhave…pe… sucinā kāyakammena, sucinā vacīkammena, sucinā manokammena – imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito viyatto sappuriso akkhataṃ anupahataṃ attānaṃ pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca viññūnaṃ, bahuñca puññaṃ pasavatī’’ti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
9. Vandanāsuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Tisso imā, bhikkhave, vandanā. Katamā tisso? Kāyena, vācāya, manasā – imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso vandanā’’ti. Navamaṃ.
innerText: 155. ‘‘Tisso imā, bhikkhave, vandanā. Katamā tisso? Kāyena, vācāya, manasā – imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso vandanā’’ti. Navamaṃ.
10. Pubbaṇhasuttaṃ

children: . ‘‘Ye
, bhikkhave, sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti
, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti, supubbaṇho, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sattānaṃ.
innerText: 156. ‘‘Ye , bhikkhave, sattā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti , vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti, supubbaṇho, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sattānaṃ.
‘‘Ye, bhikkhave, sattā majjhanhikasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti, sumajjhanhiko, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sattānaṃ.

children: ‘‘Ye
, bhikkhave, sattā sāyanhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti, susāyanho, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sattāna’’nti.
innerText: ‘‘Ye , bhikkhave, sattā sāyanhasamayaṃ kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti, susāyanho, bhikkhave, tesaṃ sattāna’’nti.

children: ‘‘Sunakkhattaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ, suppabhātaṃ suhuṭṭhitaṃ
innerText: ‘‘Sunakkhattaṃ sumaṅgalaṃ, suppabhātaṃ suhuṭṭhitaṃ [suvuṭṭhitaṃ (sī. pī.)];
Sukhaṇo sumuhutto ca, suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisu.
‘‘Padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vācākammaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;

children: Padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ, paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe

children.innerText: [paṇidhiyo padakkhiṇā (sī. pī.), paṇidhi te padakkhiṇā (syā. kaṃ.)]

innerText: Padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ, paṇīdhi te padakkhiṇe [paṇidhiyo padakkhiṇā (sī. pī.), paṇidhi te padakkhiṇā (syā. kaṃ.)];

children: Padakkhiṇāni katvāna, labhantatthe
padakkhiṇe.
innerText: Padakkhiṇāni katvāna, labhantatthe [labhatatthe (sī. pī.)] padakkhiṇe.
‘‘Te atthaladdhā sukhitā, viruḷhā buddhasāsane;
Arogā sukhitā hotha, saha sabbehi ñātibhī’’ti. dasamaṃ;
Maṅgalavaggo pañcamo.
Tassuddānaṃ –
Akusalañca sāvajjaṃ, visamāsucinā saha;
Caturo khatā vandanā, pubbaṇhena ca te dasāti.
Tatiyo paṇṇāsako samatto.
